events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been identified as a refund request due to item mix-up during shipping.
An agent specialized in refund cases has been assigned to handle this request.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the wrong item you received. I’m here to help get this resolved for you.
Could you please send a photo of the item you received and your order number to proceed with the refund?
I have attached the photo of the wrong product and my order number is 567890. Please process the refund.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the help and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
The refund process has been completed on our end and you will receive confirmation shortly.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
Yes, the refund appeared on my statement yesterday. Thank you very much for your assistance.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey to help us improve our service.
I have completed the survey and gave high marks for your excellent customer support throughout the refund process.
The case has been formally closed following successful refund and positive customer feedback.
